Articles.Content:
I'm not quite sure which mod is causing it (I have a lot), but a look through the log file makes me think this is the culprit: 

[LOG 19:59:43.489] PartLoader: Compiling Part 'Squad/Parts/FuelTank/fuelTankJumbo-64/fuelTankJumbo-64/fuelTank3-2'
[ERR 19:59:43.491] PartCompiler: Cannot replace texture as cannot find texture 'TPtank2m-Specular' to replace

The loading stops right there. I've tried removing FuelTanksPlus, which I thought may have been causing it, but it didn't work.

EDIT; Mod list:

Edited June 30, 2016 by Box of Stardust
Can you provide a list of the mods you have installed? It's hard to guess what is causing the problem with so many mods available.
Post updated with mod list. Uh, have fun I guess.

Re-add the parts you removed...

then remove all mods...... if it loads, then add one mod at a time till it stops loading again... then you will have found your culprit.

I'm guessing its not actually the parts, but a bad mod at fault.

Edited June 30, 2016 by kiwi1960

My guess is that texture replacer or Ven's Revamp is the culprit because they both change textures.

Edited June 30, 2016 by Jas0n

3 hours ago, Jas0n said:

My guess is that texture replacer or Ven's Revamp is the culprit because they both change textures.

I tried Ven's Revamp before- wasn't ir. BUT, it turns out it was Texture Replacer. Don't know why, but hey, works now.

Edited June 30, 2016 by Box of Stardust
